content.title: Students Ready
content.beneficiary: Undergraduate students in agriculture and allied sciences
content.details: The Student READY (Rural Entrepreneurship Awareness Development Yojana) program aims to provide rural entrepreneurship awareness, and practical experience in a real-life situation in rural agriculture, and create awareness to undergraduate students about practical agriculture and allied sciences. The program will help in building confidence, skills, and acquiring Indigenous Technical Knowledge (ITK) of the locality and thereby preparing the pass-out for self-employment.
eligibility: Undergraduate students in agriculture and allied sciences
